DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: 金富士(kinfuji)
DATA.description: Yakidori, which is usually visited by locals.Affordable price and comparable taste.

DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: うどんのそうまや(Soumaya)
DATA.description: Both the shrimp tempura udon and tofu pouch udon have noodles that are supple and chewy. The broth isn't too salty and overall, they were the best udon dishes I've ever eaten.

DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: アジアンバーラマイ(Ramai)
DATA.description: It's my first time trying curry soup, and it's so good that I don't think I need to try it anywhere else!

DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: 下総屋食堂(Shimofusa-ya Shokudō)
DATA.description: A Japanese meal set restaurant that has been since 1932. It offers a nostalgic taste and atmosphere, along with surprisingly affordable prices. It's a place that I always want to stay just as it is

DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: 麺 みつヰ(Men Mitsuwi)
DATA.description: A unique style of chashu and noodles. The chashu comes in three different varieties, wasn't greasy at all and its smoked flavor was really clean, pairing perfectly with the soup

DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: 早點來早餐店(ZaoDian Lai)
DATA.description: representative breakfast dish(蛋餅) with a tradition of 40 years resulting in a crispy exterior and a soft interior

DATA.name: 大智路蕭爌肉飯
DATA.description: famous pork rice bowl(肉飯) in Taichung, offering delicious sauce, braised pork, and side dishes.

DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: 小魏川菜餐廳(Xiao Wei Chuancai)
DATA.description: Szechuan restaurant near the main station in Taipei that is frequently visited by locals.

DATA.creator: eyk
DATA.name: 馬辣頂級麻辣鴛鴦火鍋
DATA.description: Hotpot restaurant famous for Unlimited and Dessert with reasonable price(800-900TWD).
